title: If Only I Knew
description: Ginny wakes up finding herself in a hospital bed with absolutely know idea how she got there. She makes it her mission to find out who, what and why they did this to her, maybe she can also help the others? Ginny Encounters multiple hot steamy romance along the way to finding out the truth. Does Ginny discover the secret to her past? Does she truly want to know? If only she kew...
author: Sophie Fox
